rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: The EU will sign a contract on Tuesday to secure over 40 million doses of a preventative avian flu vaccine for 15 countries with the first shipments heading to Finland, EU officials said on Monday.
The EU will sign a contract on Tuesday to secure over 40 million doses of a preventative avian flu vaccine for 15 countries with the first shipments heading to Finland, EU officials said on Monday.

rationale: 'will sign a contract' and 'secure' are not moderate verbs + scale/impact; 'doses' is scale but not impact of the threat.
statement_text: The EU will sign a contract on Tuesday to secure over 40 million doses of a preventative avian flu vaccine for 15 countries with the first shipments heading to Finland, EU officials said on Monday.
The EU will sign a contract on Tuesday to secure over 40 million doses of a preventative avian flu vaccine for 15 countries with the first shipments heading to Finland, EU officials said on Monday.

rationale: The segment reports a contract to secure vaccine doses, which is not a calming cue.
statement_text: The EU will sign a contract on Tuesday to secure over 40 million doses of a preventative avian flu vaccine for 15 countries with the first shipments heading to Finland, EU officials said on Monday.

rationale: The segment contains specific numbers ('over 40 million doses', '15 countries') but not a 'minimiser + scale contrast' cue.
statement_text: The EU will sign a contract on Tuesday to secure over 40 million doses of a preventative avian flu vaccine for 15 countries with the first shipments heading to Finland, EU officials said on Monday.
The EU will sign a contract on Tuesday to secure over 40 million doses of a preventative avian flu vaccine for 15 countries with the first shipments heading to Finland, EU officials said on Monday.

rationale: Describes securing doses ('will sign a contract... to secure over 40 million doses') without explicit calming language.
